name: Comfort Zone (erichalina)
description:
Make your room more comfortable! Collect one of each item to win! But watch out, if you're out of your comfort zone too long, you'll fucking die

Controls:

Arrow Keys to Move

Enter to Open Inventory

Click and drag items in/out of your inventory

Items you can pick up have orange in them (the cat clock and blanket are items)!

Made by Ahmad, Boris, Eric and Stephanie for Out of Hibernation game jam! 

Games Den Gang
